entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
